item.title: Reproducible Workflow Charter
item.description: Visible Data is all Itâ€™s extremely important to me to keep things reproducible and woke, here are some promises I commit to: Only using public datasets for which a DOI is available. Proprietary munging behind a paywall is acceptable Never use gender as a binary variable example (https://twitter.com/polesasunder/status/971622753261572096). Spell check styler lintr Refuse to work outside of a file synchronisation system Appearance Responsive iframes!
